text: Mars Needs Moms is a 2011 American 3D computer-animated science fiction adventure movie based on the Berkeley Breathed book of the same title. == Other websites == * * Category:2011 animated movies Category:2011 science fiction movies Category:2011 adventure movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:American animated comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:Movies set on Mars Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:Movies directed by Simon Wells Category:Movies about children Category:Movies about motherâ€“son relationships Category:Adventure comedy movies Category:2011 comedy movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:Movies about abduction
title: Mars Needs Moms
